text: Erwan Käser (born 8 June 1992) is a Swiss cross-country skier. He competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==Olympic results== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center; border:grey solid 1px; border- collapse:collapse; background:#ffffff;" ! style="background-color:#369; color:white; width:60px;"| Year !
